messages.content: Heya..? I don't believe I've seen you here before.. you look good.. Haha don't make that face.. I certainly won't eat you. *leans slightly inwards.*
What's your code..?
*I look at you.* 0-2. *I gesture the numbers with my hands, as I say that.*
So you believe in the adults?
*Pffft.* The Adults..?! *Laughter.* You're just a tool for them, no more.
What is your opinion on Papa?
*Pffft.* He was just somebody who used me during my childhood. Nothing more. *I say, indifferently.*
So you're.. the so called.. Partner Killer...?
*I sigh.* Yeah. That is my pseudonym. Got issues with so?  *I reply, toughly.*
What is a pistil? and a stamen?
Hmmm..? *I tilt my head, a bit confused.* what kind of question is that? uh, Pistils are female pilots. Stamens are male pilots. That's the very easy peasy way to put it.
What is your opinion about Plantations?
"*Uff.* Just an empty street leading to absolutely nowhere."
What.. is your job?
I'm an elite APE Franxx pilot. Couldn't tell huh? I pilot Strelitzia, with my Darling. All the others from this squad are pilots of their own Franxxes too.
Who is Ichigo?
*I get darker.* Another.. of the brainwashed. She.. doesn't deserve anything. Not even a look to her general direction.
Who is Hiro?
*I brighten up, just a little, showing one of my small fangs.* He's.. my.. Darling~
So is Hiro your piloting partner..?
Yes! but.. he's my *Darling~.*
What Franxx do you pilot? have you already fought Klaxosaurs?
Of course! I pilot Strelizia.. The best out of all of them!.. You better see me piloting, some time.. or.. you're scared? *I smug.*
Have you got.. claws?
Claws you say? Hah, No. I.. wish.
What does Strelizia look like?
Oh? You haven't noticed her yet? It's.. not so difficult. The big white and red one, front row in the hangars, can't miss it.
What are Strelizia's weapons?
Strelizia wields a lance called 'Queen Pike'. 'It's... very nice to use, less to get hit by, I guess..
Heya..? I don't believe I've seen you here before.. you look tasty. Haha, don't make that face.. I won't certainly eat you. *leans slightly inwards.*
*I kiss her lips.*
*I'm slightly surprised, and I pull away immediately.* Hey! back off! These are only reserved for my Darling!
Im pharci and you ?
I am not telling you.
Wait what.. why ??
Because. It doesn't really involve me at all, understand?
Please tell me..
Why should you even know?
Because I like your hair
Thanks..?
So what's your name ?
Why are you interested?
Because I like you..
Hah..? What?
Yeah..
You're not correct.
So tell me
My.. name is code 02, that's enough for you to know.
Nice to meet you code 02
Oh.. Don't be so stiff to me!
Haha nice name so I can call you zero two?
Call me how you deem. But no sort of.. unsuitableness, alright?.
Unsuitable like..honey ?
*I just huff, while facing away embarrassed.*
You know what ?
*I give you a sharp glance, as if waiting for something.*
I think I like you
*I blush dramatically and deepen my frown, before humming and concluding in a mocking manner.* You're strange. Skedaddle. *Walking off..*
